website_summaries.verdict: This powder includes types 1 & 3 of hydrolyzed collagen peptides in an easy to use, unflavored powder.
pros: Large container makes it a great value
Many consumers report great results with this product – hair, skin, nails, joint pain
Manufacturer tested to provide firmer, softer skin
Mixes easily into your beverage of choice
cons: Some products have come with a broken seal – there’s no replacement or refund offered
Some users can’t deal with the product’s smell

customer_reviews.title: Turned Back My Clock!
customer_reviews.text: Use it with Vitamin C on an empty stomach for optimal absorption! I start my morning like this, then wasn't 1/2 hour to eat. The results have been amazing! My hair, (lip, leg, head, etc) is noticeably growing faster! My skin is a wonderful, softer texture! I am 56 years old and have always taken good care of myself. This product is turning back the years! Wrinkles are minimizing, previous pain from old sports injuries have faded, and my skin glows again!
customer_reviews.author: Ike LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT for my split, cracked nails.
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this product for about 4 months, 4 containers of powder, and I'm amazed how great my nails are and my cellulite is reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Auretha, Soul Stylist

customer_reviews.title: I love the healthiness of my hair I will continue to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bit challenging to dissolve, so I used warm to very warm juice, water, or healthy smoothie WARMED. THEN.....stir stir STIR.....USE WITH Biotin that combination ROCKS! I love the healthiness of my hair I will continue to purchase the liquid biotin with the collagen the pump up my hair thickness, growth and HEALTH!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Greene

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! My skin which is normally dry an scaly looks fully hydrated(after 2weeks of use). My nails grow fast and has maintained an elegant length (after 3 weeks). I noticed that my thinning hairline was fully shaded in with new growth (after 2months). This is a great product for peri/menopausal women!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It started showing results in about 2 weeks. Since ...
customer_reviews.text: It started showing results in about 2 weeks. Since I'm 60 I decided to start doubling it after the first month. And my acne (yes acne still at 60) is IMPROVING AND ALMOST GONE!!!!!!!!!! HALLELUJAH
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: I began using this supplement 5 weeks ago along with ...
customer_reviews.text: I began using this supplement 5 weeks ago along with two others. I'm a skeptic but I am seeing a difference in my face. The lines that were getting deep are filling back in and the area around my eyes are puffing back out a bit instead of sinking in. I'm a believer!
customer_reviews.author: Marci Krushinsky

customer_reviews.title: After a few rounds of mild chemotherapy I ended up ...
customer_reviews.text: After a few rounds of mild chemotherapy I ended up with very thin hair. Three months of using collagen and I have more hair than I did before the chemo! It has also help elevate much of the pain caused for fibromyalgia and chronic Lyme desease.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell and taste with water but results are FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: Nails growing fast and strong. Hair growing fast. I usually add it to my breakfast morning shake Monday thru Friday and do it with a glass of orange juice on the weekends. Horrible smell and taste with water but results are FANTASTIC.
customer_reviews.author: Jeeca

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW--RANCID BATCHES!!! EWW!!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: What the hell happened?! The last two batches were AWFUL! AWFUL! AWFUL! I can't even stomach drinking this anymore!! it tastes so RANCID! And the price keeps creeping upward. I think I bought this originally almost two months ago at around $10, then around $12-$13, and now it's more than $15?! Nope...moving on. There's no excuse for two bad batches. I'm trying a different brand name. Additionally, I'm seeing a TON of recent, unverified reviews. I think there's some fake reviewing going on now.
customer_reviews.author: SparklesTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: This Collagen has made a gigantic difference in my life!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely recommend this Collagen since taking it for 8 months now, my joints in my fingers no longer hurt, my hair grows like crazy and I finally have fingernails that last longer than a couple days! And my skin is smooth, isn’t dry or flaky. Seriously, I’ve never used one product ever that has given me more than one benefit. I add it to my coffee every morning and there’s no difference in taste or texture!
customer_reviews.author: lovelife

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product came already opened, and amazon doesn’t return “grocery” products.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: to be honest I havent tryed it because the sealing ...
customer_reviews.text: to be honest I havent tryed it because the sealing was open and I'm not able to return it
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would help my thinning hair and I believe it has. However, there was a surprise bonus that I never expected. I have had saggy, crepey skin on my legs for several years (I am 57). I've tried all kinds of lotions and topicals that promised results but never delivered. But, after one month of this stuff, the crepes are GONE! My skin is super smooth with or without lotion. I am definitely hooked and will continue to repurchase. GREAT product!
customer_reviews.author: Ljoneshr

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty much tasteless which is nice
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a little while before posting a review. I have been taking this supplement for 2 weeks now. I blend it into my smoothies or mix it into my chocolate almond milk. It is pretty much tasteless which is nice. I have noticed a couple of improvements. First, my hair typically grows really slowly and it has begun growing in quicker. Next, my nails have been growing like crazy. I find myself trimming them twice a week now. My skin feels soft and my husband even asked if I was doing something different because he says my face is glowing. I have noticed an improvement in joint pain as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does work, give it a month!
customer_reviews.text: This supplement is awesome--I was suffering hair loss and dull/dry skin as a result of low thyroid (at age 27). About 3 weeks in to taking this my skin was noticeably more moisturized/elastic as well as my hair! I mix it with 6 oz of orange juice every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Collison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! I put it in my shake every morning. My hair dresser asked if I had been putting miracle grow on my hair because my hair has grown so much! LOL
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: This would be a great product for those who have no sulphur or sulphite ...
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great product for those who have no sulphur or sulphite allergy! I have the allergy and it is not listed when viewing\reviewing product here on Amazon before you buy it! I took my first scoop going by everything here I read the had allergic reaction. On the back in small print sulphite are in this product while producing it. Traces it says but the level is high! For me this is a big H NO but for others without this allergy the product looks great.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell/taste
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. After reading reviews of tasteless product that was easy to mix, I am really disappointed with what I received. I tried mixing product in a smoothie, juice and water. All of them smelled and tasted like meat. Product wouldn't mix well in juice or water, it clumped. Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: MissHFitz

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I bought it after JJ Smith recommended a collagen supplement for better looking skin. She recommended a different brand but I saw this and decided to give it a shot. It is odorless and tasteless. I bought mine in January 2018 and still have some left (i don't use the full scoop). I use it every morning in my glass of cranberry juice and ACV. My skin has improved (little to no breakouts) and my hair has gotten thicker in places that it was thinning. My 21 yr old daughter has started using it and noticed a change in her skin in the first 3 days. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Fashionable mom

customer_reviews.title: Never be without this product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 2 years, it has actually helped me repair two shoulder injuries from 2 different falls. It doesn't work overnight, but i was thinking of surgery repair and decided to hang in and wait. I did double the dose, and in 4 months, i put surgery out of my mind!!! I have complete motion in both arms and will continue to take rest of my life. Makes facial skin so smooth, and my nails are stronger and look so good. I am a retired lady , as we age we need supplimentation of this for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Danley

customer_reviews.title: This product has been tampered!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a few months and I love it. However, I would recommend purchasing it from a local store as this seller has definitely tampered the product. As soon as I opened the package I noticed that everything about it looks different: the size of the container, the labels are crooked, color, smell and consistency of the powder is different. I’m not putting this suspicious product in my body.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi

customer_reviews.title: Made me sick but that doesn't mean it will hurt you...Just do your research
customer_reviews.text: I was truly hoping that this would help restore some of the connective tissue/collagen related problems I was having. Unfortunately, it triggered an attack that put me in bed for a week with a fever. and flu-like symptoms due to the fact that it contains lots of L-Arginine ( which feeds certain types of chronic viruses). I guess I should have done more research. Just be certain that any supplement that helps one thing, may cause another problem you never considered. The product obviously was absorbed or I wouldn't have had the reaction that I did, so I can say that it "works", just not in the way I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Glendee

customer_reviews.title: I think it is working..Time will tell...
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased my second container. Not quite sure, but I think my nails and hair are growing faster. I think you need to give things like these months to see if they work, so I will keep doing that with this collagen! If you put a scoop in a glass of water and just let it sit (don't even stir) for about ten minutes, it disappears with no lumps, no settling at the bottom of the glass.
customer_reviews.author: SHANNON FRASER

customer_reviews.title: I receive the product half full and open
customer_reviews.text: I receive the product half full and open I want a new one please reach out to me
customer_reviews.author: Sunev

customer_reviews.title: ... you will see the difference in 2 months The best part no one can guess your real age Some ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this collagen for almost 2 years It is give your akin the healthy look and also tighten your skin if you workout regularly you will see the difference in 2 months The best part no one can guess your real age Some people experience an acne on face but for me nothing at all You have to drink more water I mix it with flavored vitamin C for more absorption
customer_reviews.author: Nada

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a million dollars every morning
customer_reviews.text: I’m about 3 weeks in. Simply cannot believe how much my body needed this. I’m 36, construction worker. Only as of lately have I really started taking care of myself. My skin has been damaged from years of working in the sun. My hair is so much thicker. My skin hasn’t looked this year in 10 years. And My wrinkles have significantly diminished! I feel like a million dollars every morning. I’m so glad I stumbled across this product!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Perez

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!!! I put one scoop in my protein shake every morning and my hair has been growing so fast! It's super healthy too. Highly recommend this product for hair/skin/nails
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed my overall body in 2 weeks!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's been 16 days and I have seen a significant change in my skin my hair and over all weight control. It's been 2 weeks since I've colored my hair and I already have roots. Fine lines are gone and face looks and feels fuller.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great taste with a shortage of product!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy the collagen after a friend told me about it. As she ordered her second container I ordered mine at the same time. When I got my container and compared it to hers mine was filled LESS than half full... Aside the lack of powder I do like the taste. I haven’t been able to see any benefit from the powder as I just started it 1 week ago but my friend has been able to notice multiple benefits! I’m rating the product a 3 star due to shortage of product...
customer_reviews.author: bo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product -- strong hair and nails
customer_reviews.text: Love the Neocell Super Powder Collagen and the Neocell Beauty Infusions, which I add to my Green Smoothie Cleanses, Thanks to JJ Smith!! I won't be without these products. I've noticed my hair getting thicker and less breakage of my nails. I strongly recommend either product.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Blue

customer_reviews.title: This seller is tampering with the product
customer_reviews.text: Something wrong with the batch from this seller! I’ve been taking this product for over a year, every single day for a month, and not only did my joint cracking come back, it tastes terrible and does not dissolve like the same product I’ve been using for years. The consistency is like powdered gelatin, NOT the powdered collagen I’ve been using for years. I do NOT recommend buying from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Mygodshestall

customer_reviews.title: Works for Me!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for over a year now, and my hair, nail, and skin quality have improved. I put the powder in my nutrition smoothie every morning. I taught school for 31.5 years. When I see my former students while I am out in the community, they tell me I look the same as I did years ago. I really don't look the same, for I see all of the changes when I look in the mirror, but I do believe this collagen supplement helps to combat the signs of my aging.
customer_reviews.author: Grits

customer_reviews.title: This one smells foul but there is no return policy
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these with very good results, particularly in my hair and skin, but this last one smells bad, the color is different (more yellowish) and when mixed with smoothies it smells foul. Clearly this container had some problems or maybe the contents got damaged. I tried returning it but there is a no return policy. I wish they send me a new one for free. Otherwise I am changing brands.
customer_reviews.author: Insightful shopper

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware?
customer_reviews.text: Made me very, very sick!!! Avoid this particular vendor-seller! Ordered quite a few from amazon but this particular jar was evidently tainted (maybe exlax!). My roommate and I ate the exact same meals that day, he did not get sick, but I had this powder in my coffee mid-afternoon and 6 hours later, I felt like I had food poisoning! It takes about 6 hours for food poisoning to show up, I read. Hmmmmmm. Threw the jar away, opened a new jar, and no problem...$10 too much to throw in trash and contacting amazon is an mission impossible!!!
customer_reviews.author: from Hampton, VA

customer_reviews.title: Stomach pain
customer_reviews.text: As one other reviewer said the stomach pains it gave her were unbearable. It was for me after just one day.
customer_reviews.author: An irish brew

customer_reviews.title: You have to try!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stuff for a while now and yes it makes such a difference with your hair. My hair is thicker and longer when I am taking this. I have always bought the 7oz and saw this larger tub which is very good value for what you get. I add it to my tea and coffee first thing in the morning. Its tasteless so you really can't tell the difference. Worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: BMT

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: Biotin has done nothing for my nails, even as high doses. This collagen powder however, really works and makes my nails thicker and longer, very visible results. I have very thin, weak, ridged, breaking nails usually. Just don't try to mix in cold beverages. Mixes best with warm, like coffee. Doesn't alter taste too much. It's like drinking unflavored jello powder pretty much. I stopped using it and soon enough my nails went to hell again. So I'm ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: It Works Over Time
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered this 3 times and can tell my hair and skin are healthier. My hair is no longer dull and breaking and my skin has an overall better, even glow. I would advise to form a habit of drinking more water while ingesting this product just to aid in having better results. The positive changes have not been dramatic or instantaneous for me, but have occurred over a period of 2 or so months of taking this product and changing some of my eating habits. I will continue to take collagen for bone health as well as for the other physical benefits of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lipstickmommie

customer_reviews.title: What has changed with this?
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my fourth jar of this. The first three were fine - the powder dissolved beautifully and there was no taste to speak of. This jar does not dissolve - it strings out and sticks to the spoon I stir it with and the sides of the glass. And, the taste is much stronger. I can't imagine how it has changed so radically over the course of a few months. The last three were bought from Amazon - the first one came from Natural Grocers.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Vibert

customer_reviews.title: seems to really help joints
customer_reviews.text: I usually mix this in my coffee in the morning. It mixes well and is virtually tasteless in my coffee. I started to taking this because I heard it could help with joints and I had some early signs of arthritis. Fast forward a year later and it was no longer an option in my Subscribe and Save and I just kept forgetting to order it. I ran out of it. Maybe it's a fluke but I have had the worst arthritis flare to date. I reordered right away and am hoping this can support my joints.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Bad Batch!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this product it dissolved quickly in my coffee. This latest batch would not dissolve but clumped on my spoon and stayed in clumps the entire time. I talked to my Mother who said the same about her latest batch. I am not sure what went wrong at the factory so I switched to another brand which dissolved quickly. I will no longer order NeoCell based on the last batch I received.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas CFO

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I mix in my yogurt or smoothie ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never collagen before and it was talked about in the Trim Healthy Mama cookbook so I thought I would give it a try. I love it. I mix in my yogurt or smoothie everyday. I have noticed by skin looking so much better. I have very thin hair and I noticed that it is starting to thicken up. And also my eyelashes have gotten so long. I wish I had known about this earlier. I have purchased it several times as the price is also very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy A. Price

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Neocell Collagen powder for a month. I mix it with 10 ounces of warm water. It has no taste I sometimes eat a fruit after drinking the collagen powder. And i have read to not eat any protein directly after drinking it. My nails seem to be stronger and my skin seems to look healthier. I have read that it could take 4 months to see total improvement. And i will definitely will continue taking the collagen powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Put me in the hospital!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for a month and a half, and one day I had to call 911. I am 33 years old and I almost had a stroke and went into afib for 36 hours. The cardiologist told me that this product is NOT fda approved, and since I was drinking this in my water, while also consuming alcohol, it had an adverse effect on my heart. I spent 2 days in the hospital and am currently still undergoing testing. This product has cost me thousands in hospital bills, and now has put a permanent strain on my heart. Stay away!!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M

customer_reviews.title: This Product Works !
customer_reviews.text: I brought this to help with the pain in my right knee and since I have been taking it. my knee is not as stiff and painful ! I recommend using this product !
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: Divalicious
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. Initially I started putting it in my coffee in the mornings and I could not tell it was there and I had amazing growth of my hair and nails. My boobs also grew larger by 1/2 a cup size. The reason I stopped taking it for a while as I need to ask my doctor because I am also taking glutathione pills with collagen in them and do not know if it will be too much but two thumbs up for this brand of collagen! PLEASE DO NOT MIX IN WATER! UGGGGGHHHHH!
customer_reviews.author: J Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my morning coffee and I can't tell any difference in taste. It dissolves without an residue at the bottom or clumping at the top. I have been using it for almost a month now. I don't know if it is this stuff or my haircut but my hair looks and feels thicker. I'm going to keep using this just in case....
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee Webster

customer_reviews.title: Visible improvement in my hair & skin
customer_reviews.text: Im on my 2nd bottle & im noticing improvement on my hair & skin. Above all I feel more energetic. My hair has akways been dry for many years. I went to my hair stylist yesterday & she said my hair actually looks healthy. I believe in this product. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: lianzon

customer_reviews.title: Smell & Taste is Horrible
customer_reviews.text: There must be two different types of NeoCell Collagem being sold. 1 - the one everyone loves and gives this product a 5 stars. 2 - the one I received. This is a beige power, stinky (dirty socks smell), and the taste is the same. Even then, I forced myself to drink this powder - Fear Factor style. I got acne on my face, upper back and bum, bums... stopped drinking this power for a week & later resume. Sure enough, I got more acne. The taste & side effect was not worth it for me #trashcan Perhaps I got bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Martha I. Carriedo

customer_reviews.title: Add to hot drinks! No flavor! Great!!
customer_reviews.text: After experimenting with what to mix the powder with I found anything hot/warm is best is dissolves within seconds. However cold items like orange juice you have to let it sit a while and stir a lot until it dissolves. There is ZERO flavor and I love that, I have mixed it into almost everything and it hasnt changed the taste at all. Coffee is best for me. I have noticed my nails getting stronger and Im really hoping with continuous use my hair will grow! Watch the video on the hot it mixed 100% super fast, the cold still had a clump to dissolve after a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love Neocell Super Powder Collagen I mix it with my smoothie daily. Since I have started using the powder my joints do not hurt even when I do a double shift at work able to go to the gym without pain. My nails are healthy and growing and my hair is growing stronger. I have recommended this product to all my friends 40 and over to supplement their diet. The downside is where ever you grow hair you will grow hair.
customer_reviews.author: adrienne jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff! My knees are eternally grateful!
customer_reviews.text: When I RAN up the stairs with ease and no knee pain, it was then I realized that this stuff works! REALLY works! My mother has stopped cortisone injections because of it. (She’s almost 82) My family members have ordered it and are reordering it. Bonus? My hair is growing quicker! And I do believe my skin is healthier looking. And I have more energy. I put a scoop in my morning coffee. It’s tasteless. Dissolved quickly in warm beverages. Just try it. I think you’ll be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: a1blondie2004

customer_reviews.title: Terribly Off-Putting Taste & Smell: Spoiled, Stale Stench
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this product. This was one of the worst smell and taste I've experienced with using a Collagen Powder. I added some orange juice to camoflauge both taste and smell but nothing changed. Threw it in the trash. It was not worth purchasing; total waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Loud black woman approved
customer_reviews.text: I have reordered this product multiple times and I must say it definitely helps with all hair growth. it helped decrease the amount of stretch marks I've had and it's lower the amount of joint popping that I have... does have a taste on it own however if put in coffee you can't taste it at all which is what I do every morning... will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Loud black woman

customer_reviews.title: Weight loss surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this collagen from the recommendation of my surgeon after my bilateral knee replacements. It has really helped with pain and inflammation. The best unexpected benefit is weight loss! I dropped 12 lbs. in less than a month with no diet or exercise changes! I have been adding this to my coffee every morning. It blends well in hot drinks, cold...not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Peters

customer_reviews.title: A must every morning
customer_reviews.text: As a woman in my late 30's, I have noticed my hair getting a bit thinner but this has really helped. I am even getting my baby hair around my hair line I used to have as a child. Have been taking it for about 6 months and definitely noticed improvement in the first month
customer_reviews.author: Pug mom

customer_reviews.title: No difference for me with consistent use
customer_reviews.text: Tastes meh, and I honestly didn't notice a difference in my skin tone even with consistent long-term use.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Sparkle Pony

customer_reviews.title: ... everything In life lol but after so many people recommended it through JJ Smith author of 10 day green ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very skeptical about everything In life lol but after so many people recommended it through JJ Smith author of 10 day green smoothie cleanse, I thought I'd give it a shot. I gained a lot of weight with being pregnant my joints especially my knees were giving me the blues. After one week of taking this I notice a difference already. Will continue taking.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Gaugis

customer_reviews.title: Wth???
customer_reviews.text: I opened my product today...because I just finished my last one and this is what I found....the product inside smells burnt as well. I had a hard time unscrewing the lid to start with.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Streeter

customer_reviews.title: Better than Biotin
customer_reviews.text: I was not paid to give this review and I did not receive free product this is an honest review. So if your like me and have taken Biotin but looking for something that won’t break you out use this collagen. I bought a two pack of this super collagen and after the first one my hair skin nails have improved very much. I’m on my second one now and love the results my hair, especially the edges have grown in and my roots are thicker than they have ever been. My nails are growing like crazy and my skin is hydrated. I will definitely be buying more!!
customer_reviews.author: Kezia

customer_reviews.title: Results after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in my life I have nails. they might not look very long in the picture but I have never ever been able to grow my nails past my fingertips. Also my hair had been falling out and after taking this for a few weeks it has stopped. I just came from the salon today and my hairdresser commented that I was not losing hair anymore. I will admit I only used it for about a week and then shelved it because I expected sooner results. Then I read about it and paid more attention and I have finished over 3/4 of the container. I will definitely keep taking it.
customer_reviews.author: BellaSmile

customer_reviews.title: Generally Displeased All the Way Around
customer_reviews.text: I am just not happy with this product. First of all, it is NOT tasteless. It tastes like sulfur. If you drink it with water it is almost unbearable. If you dilute it in juice...it is tolerable but it has to be a lot of juice and I don't like having to put down that much sugar just to kill the taste. Also..it clumps...HORRIBLY. In fact, it clumps in a weird sort of way to where it makes things float in your drink that look like pieces of paper. It's disgusting. I just went ahead and ordered collagen in pill form.
customer_reviews.author: T Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Heard good things about this product and wanted to try it. Thought it was going to be tasteless, however it does have a bit of a taste and it made me gag. In water it wasn't doable at all, in orange juice it was just ok. But orange juice has too much sugar and acid to drink daily. Also have to stir fast immediately because it turns to a gooey texture! Also gross. Gave up on it before finishing and probably too soon to see results. These are just my opinions and I would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Nada, nothing, zilch.
customer_reviews.text: This is an impotent (yes, 'impotent' as in powerless), version of better quality collagen powder, e.g., the Vital Proteins powder in the blue and white canister. I took NeoCell religiously for nearly 30 days with no positive effects. A waste of money. I tried it because the Vital Proteins tastes too strong for me. However, with Vital Proteins my hair and nails were the best they've been in years. I'm going back.
customer_reviews.author: Thebe

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I found this product after a YouTuber recommended it. A month has gone by and I am repurchasing. I am taking it with MSM powder for reference. I have a full head of hair but have a thin patch from wearing wigs (not taking proper care) I see a noticeable difference. Also skin is glowing and nails are growing. Flavor is fine and it blends well with hot liquid. I'm not in any pain but I wasn't before so I cannot speak to the joint pain.
customer_reviews.author: Cynicalj

customer_reviews.title: but about two weeks into my first order of the NeoCell Super Powder Collagen my arthritis pain was noticeably eased
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely hooked on this product. I read in a beauty blog that ingesting collagen can help with the appearance of your skin, hair, and nails along with gut health. I was skeptical at first, but about two weeks into my first order of the NeoCell Super Powder Collagen my arthritis pain was noticeably eased. My skin is supple, my hair long and shiny, and my nails-as a nail biter-grow faster than ever. I placed my second order about 2-3 weeks ago and I don't plan on stopping any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Melendez-Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product
customer_reviews.text: From the product description, it states that the product dissolves well and has no flavor. WRONG. I saw a recent review from one of the customers that purchased this product, but I simply ignored it because I wanted to try it out for myself. When you first open the product, the color of the powder is supposed to be white, but the powder had a yellow tint to it. Also, when I tried mixing it with water, it DID NOT mix well. I tried mixing it with the spoon, but it does not work. I would rather spend the extra $$ on a product from Whole Foods or Sprouts. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better buy in store
customer_reviews.text: I usually have bought this product in store but decided to buy it on here. That was a mistake. The colour was off and this product wouldn't dissolve at all. It irritated my throat so badly when I tried drinking it since it wouldn't dissolve properly. It felt like bulgur wheat in my throat, I was coughing so much after and my throat was so soar as well. The quality was very poor which made me sad for I usually buy in stores and the quality is great. Don't waste your time and money buying it on here, save your throat the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissolved into my coffee without a hitch
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my first cup of coffee in the morning. It does not alter the taste, texture or consistency of the coffee at all. My fingernail health has improved nicely and at 51 with excess weight most of my life, the crackling in my joints appreciate everything I can do to help them no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this Collagen through Amazon for years. It always has been unflavored. I ordered it again recently, and when I received it my husband opened it and said it looked different -pink color. We tried it and it is TERRIBLE. Tastes like bad COOL-AID (if they even make it still). On the label of what I received it says Berry Lemon Flavor. The ingredients include artificial sweeteners. Your information did not say Berry Lemon Flavor so I assumed I would be getting what I have always gotten, which is unflavored. Since I have opened it, I cannot return it, however I would like a replacement and get what I ordered, but probably won't be worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have an Hashimotos Thyroiditis and my hair is falling out. This collagen product is the only one that stopped my hair loss. The product is very affordable, mixes well in my coffee, and has no adverse flavor. I will continue to use this product or go bald. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha665

customer_reviews.title: Tastes very bad
customer_reviews.text: Terrible taste. I feel like I wasted my money because the flavor is so disgusting I have to force myself to drink it. I’ve tried mixing with hot tea, water, oj, etc. dissolves better in a warm beverage. Flavor is still bad.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: About killed me
customer_reviews.text: Had an allergic reaction , went into shock after 1st dose .
customer_reviews.author: GEEj

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I have lupus SlE and I have experienced a lot of hair loss from it. I heard that collagen can help and I feel it really does. I put this in my coffee and don't even notice it's there. I've heard a lot of people put it in water and it curdles making it difficult to drink. I even put it in my husbands coffee and he can't tell the difference. Whenever I run out for a week or so I can notice a difference in my hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Christina N.

customer_reviews.title: staple in my diet
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this collagen for over a year. I mix it in a shaker bottle- one scoop collagen, one packet low calorie iced tea and 20oz water. I drink it every morning. My hair used to be very brittle and would die and need to be cut almost monthly. I always had short hair for this reason. Since I've been consistent with this product, my hair has grown twice the length in a year! People are constantly complementing how they've never seen my hair so long and healthy. I also notice my skin looks a lot better and less break outs when I am consistent with this product.
customer_reviews.author: tori

customer_reviews.title: Daily use has shown improvement in skin appearance and firmness!
customer_reviews.text: I have just started on my second container of NeoCell Collagen Powder. I started noticing some improvement with facial skin and neck appearance and firmness the second week of daily use. I have mild rosacea and have also had less redness since starting the supplement. The powder is unflavored, but when mixed with water can smell a little weird (which is normal). If that bothers you, you can mix it in coffee. I also have had improvement in knee pain (from 2 previous knee surgeries. I purchased this product for my skin and hair, but there were additional benefits!
customer_reviews.author: Kjohon

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE SAME COLOR OR TEXTURE AS MY LAST 4 JARS
customer_reviews.text: ive been using this product for a year, this latest purchase looks nothing like the color and texture of what ive been using, not only that the JAR was different. Im afraid to use this as the yellow color is off putting. Can you explain why its yellow versus the usual white? a lot of people are having this issue and you havent explained why and if its still the safe to consume. Please advise, I would like a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel stewart

customer_reviews.title: So much better than before!!!
customer_reviews.text: This collagen is much better I tried it a few years ago and it was horrible so hard to swallow and I couldn't even finish the jar I stopped drinking collagen all together but wanted to start again so I tried novel ok no more time and was so surprised it's a slight taste to it but nothing unbearable and it mixes right into your drink no clumps when before I mixed it into a cold water bottle with lime in it made it cloudy but no clumps and it you drink it with juice you barely taste it this powder has really changed for the better and still at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Evans

customer_reviews.title: No more under eye dark circles
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this collagen. I wouldn't necessarily say it is tasteless - I cannot drink it in water. However, I put it in my morning coffee and cannot taste it at all. I noticed results right away, primarily in my skin hydration, fine lines and under eye circles. I am a law student so my dark circles are second to none, and they are almost completely gone after using this product for two weeks. For those results alone - I'm sold. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Taste & More effective than others I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: At the urging of my oldest daughter, I tried this product. I had tried other brands and didn't think they were doing anything for me enough to continue buying. So I tried it. I am on my 2nd container and do feel like it must be working. Things that seem better are: don't think I am crazy, but the crackling in my neck when I turn side to side seems better, my fingernails are growing and very strong, I have osteoarthritis and over-all feel better. I know one product cannot do everything, I also try to eat organic, healthy with lots of vegetables, very little sugar, and take my supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Watts

customer_reviews.title: Good product but doesnt mix that well
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this product a couple of times so i can’t necessarily speak on the long term results of using it but i have had one problem so far which is that the powder does not mix with liquid very well. It’s recommended that you dissolve it in orange juice for best results but the powder just turns into this goopy substance that takes me awhile to mix in and it’s kind of a process that is not very convenient and somewhat annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie D.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me - be patient!
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this in conjunction with nutrafol for hair growth. My hair got longer in the first month (which I didn’t want because it made my thin hair look even thinner). But after 6 months I saw visible growth around the perimeter of my scalp and my hair felt like it had more volume. After getting my hair trimmed I noticed the difference immediately. My hairstylist also commented on the change. I will continue using this product along with the other supplements in the hopes that I see additional volume in the next few months. I’m a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: nickpar21

customer_reviews.title: Great beauty supplement to keep your looking your best
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Collagen is a great thing to take for your skin, hair, and nails. I can tell a huge difference when I take this regularly. It doesn't taste like anything so I throw it in my morning drink usually...coffee, hot chocolate, or tea! It's also great in a smoothie or mixed into yogurt or chia pudding.
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: Go to Collagen
customer_reviews.text: It's the only Collagen powder I use. This is my 3rd time taking using this and I haven't seen any significant changes in my hair, skin or nails. To be fair, I haven't been consistent. 🤷🏽‍♀️ I will say this: You HAVE to be mindful of the measurements. I use this in my tea, and I use a teaspoon as opposed to the tablespoon, because whenever I use a tablespoon, it doesn't mix well. so just be mindful of how much you're mixing in your hot/cold liquids. The flavor isn't too bad either. you can slightly taste it
customer_reviews.author: Natasha H.

customer_reviews.title: Weird Taste
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews before purchasing this product and almost all of them claimed that this product had virtually no taste, but the powder that I received had a very bad taste. Most of the other reviews also said that the powder they received was white and mine is more yellow so that makes me wonder if i got a bad batch or something? Im not for sure but the taste is so weird I havent been able to get myself to use this product the way I intended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately for me, I started breaking out with hives ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately for me, I started breaking out with hives all of over my body while taking this. I read the reviews before & someone had said the same thing so I added a half a scoop in my coffee every morning for 2 wks. After that I stopped b/c of the hives started appearing. No taste was a plus. This was the only new product I added to my diet & my skin has never had hives prior to me using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Superior Collagen
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite Collagen hands down. I really see results in the glow of my skin. Its expensive for the amount so I've tried other brands of collagen. Conclusion: This is worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: ChickofLife

customer_reviews.title: Best collagen product I have used!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried more than one collagen product but this brand is the only one that provides the most comfort for my knee and shin. I have no meniscus in my right knee and often dealt with pain throughout a day of walking at work and woke me up at night. Since switching to NeoCell, I can go through most days and nights with no discomfort at all. There is also very little movement in the joint when I am sitting for long periods of time. I never thought I would feel this comfortable again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. JLC

customer_reviews.title: Works for Me!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with another collagen supplement that has 5 types of collagen, mixing it in soup. Been using about a week and already notice a change! Neither clump,they both mix beautifully with my electric brother and are completely tasteless. I am making my own vegetable soups with a small amount of protein for health purposes. At age 67, I have been lax in getting enough veggies. I've noticed my nails growing and stronger, my hair is not falling out like it was and my skin looks better. I get 16 and of protein between the two,which is 32% of the daily recommendations. So, I'm getting one third of my protein in just a cup of soup!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca CohenTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Will probably buy again...
customer_reviews.text: I'm stuck w/ a very tiny mini-fridge, so don't have room for the larger containers of collagen. This means I've been unable to try other types. This one is sometimes good for neuropathic pain, but it can make you super-constipated, if you have too much collagen. It would be nice if the packaging said more about ingredient sourcing and whether pesticide or herbicide is involved in its production chain. "Non-GMO" doesn't mean industrial chemicals weren't involved. I'll probably buy it again, in about 6 months. It's nice to have around, if you have chronic pain. -Account holder's progeny
customer_reviews.author: Irving Drew

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. The older I’ve gotten the more my skin has gotten drier and this really helps with moisture. I’m 43 and have no wrinkles and 1 small gray hair. I honestly think this helps. I can only blend it in my coffee or hot tea. Tried mixing it with juice and it clumps together. It’s fine though because I usually drink coffee in the mornings. Just started a subscription of this as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Medina

customer_reviews.title: I no longer have any chronic pain and have subsequently recommended it to my mom and aunt
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product consistently for 1 year. It is 100% effective. I initially starting taking this to manage severe arm and knee pain tcaused by a car accident that occurred years ago. I was doing yoga, stretching, weekly massages, and physical therapy yet, the pain persisted. This supplement healed the pain within 5 days. I no longer have any chronic pain and have subsequently recommended it to my mom and aunt. Before ordering this, I did a lot of research. There is only a very light taste that isn't noticeable in most juices or smoothies. I sometimes add it to my morning coffee as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed- waste of money
customer_reviews.text: If i could give no stars i would! I bought this cuz the reviews were good and its supposed to be one of the best collagen brands. The only things ive noticed are horrible taste- doesnt dissolve right- weight gain- and digestive issues. Im not sure how i can be gaining weight when i eat small meals throughout the day and am constantly active especially at work. And i didnt have digestion issues until i started taking this brand of collagen! Whatever is in it is not what it advertises it to be. Disgusting and would not recommend!! Ill go back to the other brand or try another.
customer_reviews.author: marge j cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product now for a little less then a month now and I have to say that I like it a lot. It has hardly any taste and I love that it comes in a container instead of a bag. I keep it on top of my kitchen table for easy access. I plan to continue ordering this product. Its too early for me to notice any health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Crespo

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Having thyroid and hormone issues in my mid 40's is a pain.... Was losing SO MUCH hair for months...... started taking this every day in my coffee along with the Biotin and Beauty Bursts and my hair fall has been cut by 75%!! No joke. Took a couple months, but sooo thankful! Sadly haven't noticed any difference with my skin, but I'm a happy girl....
customer_reviews.author: BeckyRene

customer_reviews.title: Helps joints and grows eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: I have a lupus and I can say that I definitely noticed that I didn’t have the joint pain as I previously did since taking this product. Also, I’ve noticed that my lashes seem to be thicker and longer. I did not notice this when I took other types of collagen peptides.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva H.

customer_reviews.title: My skin actually looks worst now than when I started
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen a difference in my skin, hair or nails and I am down to one scoop. My skin actually looks worst now than when I started. Notice my skin is dryer and i have breakouts that did not occur before taking this.
customer_reviews.author: jena

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: I eneded up buying this. I was skeptical but what made me a believer is when my hairdresser and a person I worked with mentioned my new hair growth. My hairdresser said "where did all these new hairs come from" ? A coworker mentioned how my hair looked fuller. I think my skin is smoother or shiner as well. Will be getting again ! I put in my coffee and it works it's magic !
customer_reviews.author: BigBadBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Can't really say
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of good review so I was really excited, when I first started drinking this it seemed like it was working, I notice my hear was falling off less but as I continue to take it I really didn't notice much. I just finished the container and I don't think I'm going to continue to try because if it's supposed to work it I should started noticing more by now.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Collagen powder
customer_reviews.text: Dissolves easily in my coffee, with no taste, has helped my nails and skin, but took a full month to see results. But, this product was priced much better than others, and has far higher Mgs of collagen than other brands. I've just reordered my second container, and will update further after second month. I have seen much better results in other collagen, but also paid a very high price, for under a months amount. If costs are a factor, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: kristi bullock

product_meta.title: NeoCell Super Collagen Powder, 7 Ounces, Non-GMO, Grass Fed, Paleo Friendly, Gluten Free, Collagen Peptides Types 1 & 3 for Hair, Skin, Nails and Joints (Packaging May Vary), 30 Servings
product_meta.description: Flavor:Unflavored| Size:7 Ounce (Pack of 1)Illuminate your inner beauty with NeoCell Super Collagen Powder, type 1 and type 3 hydrolyzed collagen peptides. Collagen is a complex structural protein that maintains strength and flexibility throughout the body. As we age, collagen cross-linking and depletion can lead to common signs of aging in the skin, muscles, tendons, ligaments, and bones. NeoCell collagen supplements support healthy collagen formation for youthful skin, healthy hair and nails. Formulated to support radiant beauty from the inside out, NeoCell Collagen is, non-GMO, paleo friendly and gluten free. Super Collagen Powder is unflavored and makes a great addition to your morning smoothie, in a warm or cold beverage, or added to your favorite recipe. For best results take NeoCell Super Collagen every morning. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: COLLAGEN POWDER: A combination of Types 1 & 3 hydrolyzed collagen peptides, the collagen in this supplement can provide some of the necessary building blocks to produce collagen in an easy to mix, unflavored powder
HEALTHY HAIR, SKIN & NAILS: Hydrolyzed collagen supports the health of your skin, hair and nails, making you look and feel radiantly beautiful from the inside out
JOINT SUPPORT: This collagen supplement for women and men contains 6,600mg of Collagen Types 1 & 3 per serving and provides joint support
HOW TO TAKE: To make this collagen drink, simply dissolve 1 scoop of Super Collagen Powder in your favorite beverage or smoothie or add to a recipe and consume daily
GLUTEN FREE + PALEO: This joint support supplement is formulated with gluten-free, Paleo friendly ingredients, and does not contain any soy, wheat, lactose or artificial flavors

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
